description.english: Complete any 10 levels gaining all three stars.
description.german: Meistere beliebige 10 Level mit allen drei Sternen.
description.italian: Completa 10 livelli qualsiasi ottenendo tutte le tre stelle.
description.dutch: Voltooi 10 willekeurige levels met alle drie de sterren.
description.brazilian: Conclua quaisquer 10 níveis ganhando três estrelas.
description.ukrainian: Complete any 10 levels gaining all three stars.

description.english: Remove a card with timer not later than in 2 seconds before an explosion.
description.russian: Снимите карту с таймером за 2 секунды до взрыва.
description.german: Entfern eine Karte mit Timer bis maximal 2 Sekunden vor einer Explosion.
description.spanish: Retira una carta con temporizador 2 segundos (o antes) de que se produzca una explosión.
description.french: Enlevez une carte chronométrée plus de deux secondes avant l'explosion.
description.italian: Elimina una carta con il timer almeno entro 2 secondi da un'esplosione.
description.dutch: Verwijder een kaart met timer binnen dan 2 seconden voor een explosie.
description.polish: Zdejmij kartę z minutnikiem 2 sekundy przed eksplozją.
description.brazilian: Remova uma carta com o contador abaixo de 2 segundos antes de uma explosão.
description.ukrainian: Remove a card with timer not later than in 2 seconds before an explosion.

description.english: You need to remove a card that chains cards of the same color so that, as a result, not even one chained card will appear.
description.russian: Снимите карту, которая набрасывает цепи, так, чтобы не набросилась ни одна цепь.
description.german: Du musst eine Karte, die Karten derselben Farbe verkettet, so entfernen, dass nicht eine einzige verkettete Karte erscheint.
description.spanish: Retira una carta que encadene cartas del mismo color para que no aparezca ninguna carta de la cadena.
description.french: Retirez une carte qui enchaîne les cartes de la même couleur entre elles, de telle façon qu'il ne reste aucune carte enchaînée.
description.italian: Elimina una carta che fa incatenare carte dello stesso colore in modo che, così, non apparirà nemmeno una carta incatenata.
description.dutch: Je moet een kaart verwijderen die kaarten van dezelfde kleur tot reeks maakt. Doe dit op zo'n manier dat geen enkele reekskaart verschijnt.
description.polish: Zdejmij kartę, która narzuca łańcuchy, tak aby nie narzuciła żadnego łańcucha.
description.brazilian: Você precisa remover uma carta que encadeia cartas da mesma cor para que, como resultado, nenhuma carta encadeada apareça.
description.ukrainian: You need to remove a card that chains cards of the same color so that, as a result, not even one chained card will appear.

description.english: Remove 5 cards in less than 5 seconds.
description.spanish: Retira 5 cartas en menos de 5 segundos.
description.french: Retirez 5 cartes en moins de 5 secondes.
description.italian: Elimina 5 carte in meno di 5 secondi.
description.dutch: Verwijder 5 kaarten in minder dan 5 seconden.
description.brazilian: Remova 5 cartas em menos de 5 segundos.
description.ukrainian: Remove 5 cards in less than 5 seconds.

description.english: In the Valley, complete 7 levels within one day.
description.russian: Пройдите в Долине 7 уровней за 1 день.
description.german: Schaff 7 Level im Tal an einem einzigen Tag.
description.spanish: Completa 7 niveles del valle en un solo día.
description.french: Terminez 7 niveaux de la Vallée en une journée.
description.italian: Completa 7 livelli entro un giorno nella Valle.
description.dutch: Voltooi binnen een dag 7 levels in de vallei.
description.polish: Ukończ 7 poziomów w Dolinie w ciągu 1 dnia.
description.brazilian: Conclua 7 níveis em um dia no Vale.
description.ukrainian: In the Valley, complete 7 levels within one day.

description.english: In the Mysterious Forest, complete 7 levels within one day.
description.russian: Пройдите в Таинственном лесу 7 уровней за 1 день.
description.german: Schaff 7 Level im geheimnisvollen Wald an einem einzigen Tag.
description.spanish: Completa 7 niveles del bosque misterioso en un solo día.
description.french: Terminez 7 niveaux de la Forêt mystérieuse en une journée.
description.italian: Completa 7 livelli entro un giorno nella Foresta misteriosa.
description.dutch: Voltooi binnen een dag 7 levels in het mysterieuze bos.
description.polish: Ukończ 7 poziomów w Tajemniczym Lesie w ciągu 1 dnia.
description.brazilian: Conclua 7 níveis em um dia na Floresta Misteriosa.
description.ukrainian: In the Mysterious Forest, complete 7 levels within one day.

description.english: In the Floating Islands complete 7 levels within one day.
description.russian: На Парящих островах пройдите за 1 день 7 уровней.
description.german: Schaff 7 Level auf den treibenden Inseln an einem einzigen Tag.
description.spanish: Completa 7 niveles de las islas flotantes en un solo día.
description.french: Terminez 7 niveaux de l'Île flottante en une journée.
description.italian: Completa 7 livelli entro un giorno sulle Isole fluttuanti.
description.dutch: Voltooi binnen een dag 7 levels op de zwevende eilanden.
description.polish: Ukończ 7 poziomów na Latających Wyspach w ciągu 1 dnia.
description.brazilian: Conclua 7 níveis em uma dia nas Ilhas Flutuantes.
description.ukrainian: In the Floating Islands complete 7 levels within one day.

description.english: In the Volcano, complete 7 levels within one day.
description.russian: Пройдите на локации Вулкан 7 уровней за 1 день.
description.german: Schaff 7 Level im Vulkan an einem einzigen Tag.
description.spanish: Completa 7 niveles del volcán en un solo día.
description.french: Terminez 7 niveaux du Volcan en une journée.
description.italian: Completa 7 livelli entro un giorno sul Vulcano.
description.dutch: Voltooi binnen een dag 7 levels in de vulkaan.
description.polish: Ukończ 7 poziomów w Wulkanie w ciągu 1 dnia.
description.brazilian: Conclua 7 níveis em uma dia no Vulcão.
description.ukrainian: In the Volcano, complete 7 levels within one day.

description.english: In the Tropics, complete 7 levels within one day.
description.russian: Пройдите в Тропиках 7 уровней за день.
description.german: Schaff 7 Level in den Tropen an einem einzigen Tag.
description.spanish: Completa 7 niveles de los trópicos en un solo día.
description.french: Terminez 7 niveaux des Tropiques en une journée.
description.italian: Completa 7 livelli entro un giorno ai Tropici.
description.dutch: Voltooi binnen een dag 7 levels in de tropen.
description.polish: Ukończ 7 poziomów w Tropikach w ciągu 1 dnia.
description.brazilian: Conclua 7 níveis em um dia nos Trópicos.
description.ukrainian: In the Tropics, complete 7 levels within one day.
